name: Spyderware
description:
Navigation > By pressing alternating buttons, navigate through Escher-like rooms. Walk up ramps to cling to the floor, the ceiling and the walls and infiltrate further in to the system.

Puzzling > Sling Cyber Webs to connect nodes to each other in the right order. Having a finished circuit activates doors or elevators. Cancel the Cyber Web to move the objects back to their original position.

Combat > Employ a unique shooting system to defeat powerful anti-virusses when you get near to ring-0 of the system’s security. Unlock doors to go deeper in the system and fight against a climactic boss fight to gain access to the core.
